text: Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ
edit: Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ

translations.transtext: Monks, a monk in this [religion] cultivates the mindfulness-factor by means of seclusion, dispassionateness, [and] cessasion, resulting in relinquishment.
